attributes.additional_details: I want the removal of all fire doors that are unecessary in coucil/housing association houses, we as tennants are not allowed to remove them in any way, they are hazardous for children and also adults, they do not need to be on rooms and cupboard spaces, please the more people who sign this the more digits and limbs we can save. Please if your a parent or know someone this has happened to sign below thank you for you vote :o)
